page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: I WAKE AT ABOUT 7.30 AM AND HAVE A BREAKFAST OF CRUNCHY NUT CORNFLAKES. AT A QUARTER TO EIGHT I START MY WAY TO SCHOOL WHICH IS ABOUT 50 METRES AWAY. OUR SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00AM AND WE HOLD OUR ASSEMBLIES ON A TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY AND FRIDAY. UP UNTIL 10.30AM WE HAVE CLASS TEACHING WHERE WE LEARN ABOUT READING WRITING AND ARITHMETIC. WE HAVE A BREAK AT THIS TIME LASTING FOR 15 MINS. AFTER THE BREAK WE HAVE GROUPWORK WHERE WE ARE SPLIT INTO GROUPS OF EQUAL ABILITY AND WHERE FIVE SUBJECTS ARE TAUGHT AT THE SAME TIME. WE HAVE DINNER AT 12.00 UNTIL 13.00. AFTER DINNER WE HAVE MORE GROUPWORK UNTIL 14.30 WHEN WE HAVE ANOTHER BREAK LASTING 10 MINS. WE FINISH THE AFTERNOON WITH EMPIRICAL STUDIES AND GO HOME AT 15.30.
